owner.description: Nametag or public key of the trusted human owner. Only the owner can give commands to the agent.

dmPolicy.description: DM access control policy. 'open' allows anyone, 'allowlist' restricts to allowFrom list, 'pairing' requires mutual opt-in, 'disabled' blocks all inbound DMs.

allowFrom.description: List of nametags or public keys allowed to DM when dmPolicy is 'allowlist'.
